pkgmetadata.longdescription: VBAN project is an open-source implementation of the VBAN protocol. VBAN is a simple audio over UDP protocol proposed by VB-Audio. It is composed of several command-line tools allowing to stream audio coming from audio backend interfaces to VBAN stream (vban_emitter) or decode incoming VBAN streams to audio backend interfaces (vban_receptor), or send text over the vban protocol (vban_sendtext). Currently ALSA, PulseAudio and JACK audio backends are supported plus a simple FIFO pipe output for raw PCM data.
